Articles.Content: Sorry for this extreme noob question but I just downloaded KSP (steam) and was resizing the window. I accidentally made the window too big, and now I cannot shrink it due to the fact that I am unable to click accept. Thanks!

You can either use Alt+Enter to switch to fullscreen temporarily to make it easier to get to the button, or you can close KSP and edit the resolution directly in the settings.cfg file in your KSP folder.
